objects.text:
• WATERPROOF (IP67)
• 20 HOURS PLAYTIME
• BUILT-IN POWERBANK
• JBL PARTYBOOST

product_details.name: JBL CHARGE 5 - Portable Waterproof (IP67) Bluetooth Speaker with Powerbank USB Charge out, 20 hours playtime, JBL Partyboost (Black)
product_details.description: Take the party with you no matter what the weather. The JBL Charge 5 speaker delivers bold JBL Original Pro Sound, with its optimized long excursion driver, separate tweeter and dual pumping JBL bass radiators. Up to 20 hours of playtime and a handy powerbank to keep your devices charged to keep the party going all night. Rain? Spilled drinks? Beach sand? The IP67 waterproof and dustproof Charge 5 survives whatever comes its way. Thanks to PartyBoost, you can connect multiple JBL PartyBoost-enabled speakers for a sound big enough for any crowd. With all-new colors inspired by the latest street fashion trends, it looks as great as it sounds.

banner_details:
This square digital banner features a bold and modern layout for promoting a portable Bluetooth speaker. The background is divided into four quadrants with varying shades of black and dark gray, intersected by soft white grid lines that add structure. The brand name in the top-left corner ("heading") is presented in white, followed by the prominently styled red product name ("subheading") which captures immediate attention. Just below is a gray tagline ("tagline") in a tech-inspired font style. The lower-left side lists product features in minimalist bullet points ("description"). The price ("price") is large and bold in white, standing out against darker tones. The red "SHOP NOW" button ("cta_button" and "cta_text") is call-to-action focused. A stylish speaker image ("product_image") on the right complements the visual hierarchy.

**Color Palette:**
- Black: `#0A0A0A`
- Dark Gray: `#212121`, `#151515`, `#1A1A1A`
- Red: `#FF0000`, `#BF0000`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
- Light Gray: `#CCCCCC`
product_color: The product image showcases a sleek design with a dominant black color (#1C1C1C) that gives the speaker a bold and premium appearance. This is elegantly contrasted by deep red accents (#8B0000) outlining the JBL logo, which enhances brand visibility without overwhelming the sophisticated look. The fabric texture adds depth, while the dark grey/silver elements (#A9A9A9) on buttons and icons subtly highlight functional areas. White lighting (#FFFFFF) details provide contrast, making it visually appealing. These colors blend harmoniously, emphasizing both durability and modern style. For an advertisement banner, this palette creates a powerful and tech-savvy visual impact.
